body:
**Breaking Changes**
- Rename Matrix4.projViewFromRectangle() to perspectiveOffCenterViewFromRectangle() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/8cc09c2b41ccc19c1fd799211038cd8f5cd9fe1a)

**Additions**
- Quaternion.mul(scalar) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/316) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/313e8390f59017831052aadd71f27d2d23e7e6b4)
- Matrix2d.getTransposed(\[int, \]FloatBuffer)/getTransposedFloats() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)
- Matrix3d.getTransposed()/getTransposedFloats() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)
- Matrix3x2d.getTransposed()/getTransposedFloats() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)
- Matrix4d.getTransposed(\[int, \]FloatBuffer)/getTransposedFloats() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)

**Fixes**
- Matrix2.mulComponentWise() - Thanks to @TheIceCreamBear (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/310) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/44177d8329ab824a9a88e118ab17a31c0fe9a692)
- Vector2f.round() - Thanks to @xupwup (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/314) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/be615b3b805a25bc94e6b129f36df60210ff69b5)
- Matrix2d.getTransposed(Buffer) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)
- Matrix4x3d.getTransposedFloats(ByteBuffer) - Thanks to @theagentd (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/317) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d99f4f08ee19980151d21a3710f17c8281e8223c)

**Breaking Changes**
- Remove non-const methods from Matrix4f/dc interfaces - those were in there by mistake (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4d3a4f3b3d1914903106b32663e6f7fe6beeb6a6)

**Additions**
- Quaternion.getEulerAnglesZXY() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1c1922fb103f29911cbcbdd2f832966b18d763c7)
- Quaternion.getEulerAnglesYXZ() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/f5ede558e10972029658e10164118460eeb0bf58)
- Matrix4.[set]perspectiveOffCenterFov() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/21db7f06b271020611f44d66cbc49bd12eed2f9d, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/82539aec5aff5b05746f3a49c3ae9bd56edd52b5)
- Matrix4/4x3.translationRotateInvert() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/aad9dfcac29c79240c91602d95bf396966b2819e)
- Matrix4.[set]perspectiveOffCenterFovLH() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c88d4da00f3a509af346bd44faa1944f7dc56f99)

**Fixes**
- Intersection.intersect/testSphereSphere() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/304) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1ba8c57cba70f67ef1315d6abd7e9bd41c2e063f)
- Setting matrix properties in Matrix4.negateX/Y/Z() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/280d561d900c72c57e7cb5e079a9f06018e5b4ee)
- Matrix4x3f.invert(Matrix4f) - m33 element was set to 0.0 instead of 1.0 (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/01ae4f0fef9c2687de24c70f2d20605998b0cf9c)

**Miscellaneous**
- Remove unnecessary local variables and set all matrix fields in Matrix4/4x3.rotateTranslationInternal() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/305) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/489f4392a79109205fe7f6c0ec9636f1a70eecf3)
- Enable FAST_MATH path for sin(float) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/307) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/984fae3623ba6c2d5e9e7c4e198cd60858bf0081)
- Refactor Matrix4f element accesses to always use getter/accessor method - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/2ef7a7059f8f39a84cb5bf9a0d14f66209918d63)

**Additions**
- Matrix4.tile(x, y, w, h) - to map a sub-cuboid of a ortho or perspective view (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/676c54385d0896691f3feb21b7dde60203c6c619)
- Matrix4x3.mul3x3(elements...) - multiply by specifying individual matrix elements (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/21c14aef85638bd24aa38321e49496da5e6bbf9f)
- Matrix3/4x3/4.mapXYZ/...() - doing 90°/180°/270° rotations (and -1 scaling) without using sin/cos (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c2beed442d0440fe27aa6805616fcbd4fddafc6d, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/f37e8d562eedd2bce5a69bd3ad7ae73bfb088265, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3ced0b4cc3f1959988a4e5b66d546c1c71037e13, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1948aa9891b57ed93373213ecf252d47c0ade4fe, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/15b6c1713f8ec25e3fa82b6c9b629f723305d4e6, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/dea2ddbfd943a23c36c3bc6a19bd19a5ce836a9f)
- Matrix3/4x3/4.negateX/Y/Z() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b6edd37fae9006edb3e7347bfd277ed79c48d9b3, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3ced0b4cc3f1959988a4e5b66d546c1c71037e13, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/dea2ddbfd943a23c36c3bc6a19bd19a5ce836a9f)
- Matrix3/4x3/4.getEulerAnglesXYZ() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1587fbc03813d3005edf58eb0faea7877920a54e)
- Quaternion.getEulerAnglesZYX() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/6fe925bdd972d70db997013d935662b8aa526516)

**Fixes**
- Typo in Matrix\*Stack.popMatrix() exception message - Thanks to @squid233 (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/303) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/8d10d9cd4144ce683852702f264e3786e9a9a003)

**Breaking Changes**
- Matrix3dc.getRowColumn() parameter order - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/285) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/71addb8a8b98a2679c0e759ed9a10bf79338ec0b)

**Additions**
- FrustumIntersection.testLineSegment() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/292) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3ca7519c070209867216ce6bf141dc24974ade6c)

**Fixes**
- Matrix.toString() not respecting joml.format.decimals option - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b559f052e91beccda9d8b799a3876b450200eaf6)
- Matrix3dc.getRowColumn() parameter order - Thanks to @leacoleaco (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/285) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/71addb8a8b98a2679c0e759ed9a10bf79338ec0b)
- Matrix4x3d.setFloats(index, ByteBuffer) not respecting provided index - Thanks to @leacoleaco (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/286) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/5f59006db34a4ba4898b5d4576a7f4b2acf059d9)

**Miscellaneous**
- Fixes to JavaDocs - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/32aedaac46b5b4536a02f37951a721e1c156ed6a, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b8f531c2f318629dbbd744148aa5e8aa749661a7, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/56ebda46ba1871e6d842b0a71b382d7f67c466ac, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/83ff59b479921896b989bb4d018bfbbd86d29bd1)

**Additions**
- Reintroduce Intersectionf/d classes - temporarily moved to joml-primitives in the 1.10.0 release  (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/51fd2fe432d3d2b09a11db2ac6a79441be1d1c60)
- Matrix4x3.scaleAround() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/0b464dcddb8c2fffb7ff68ba7ad0138d957ad055)
- Matrix.set(int, Buffer) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/281) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/7fd5da7d2c36c6a9d2383ab52815de020532b94e)

**Fixes**
- Vector4.set(array) - Thanks to @brunesto (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/278) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4b002f1ea3b7403fb7fca35b073378622083e714)
- Aliasing bug in Matrix4.scaleAround() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/130ecb31ff8bd8e20ea3af8c26af99496cb4191c)
- Aliasing bug in Matrix4.frustum()/frustumLH() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/dceb7e863cee3d91e053b76a17ff4083a24c21cd)
- Matrix3x2f.get3x3(buffer) when using sun.misc.Unsafe - Thanks to @nickthecoder (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/280) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/57bbb1828ad1d04363d0757dec91a0f88b2f82d9)

**Miscellaneous**
- Implement java.lang.Cloneable for all classes - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/279) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/223693611854b5c6001533a36a92bf39cef320bf)
- Use Math.fma() in Matrix4.project() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/23fd272ac941cd133d5fe70bb186df04c4d01598)
- Fix JavaDocs of Matrix4(x3).arcball(..., dest) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/ffc5962031a37347f5c2bcd4720e87ec5a1ec41c)
- Use Math.fma() in more Matrix4f.rotate\*() methods - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b6f3bf9402614a258997c1f95b58ef70a1f49cbc)

**Breaking Changes**
- Geometry primitives classes and the Intersectionf/d classes have been moved to `org.joml:joml-primitives` under package `org.joml.primitives`. The change of package `org.joml` to `org.joml.primitives` for these classes was necessary because multiple modules in the Java 9+ module system (Jigsaw) cannot export the same package when one module also depends on the other for that same package. - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/274) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/8211a8a80a3b5e3d79ac983d93970e8d2a1dba5e)

*Development (including release notes for the changes between 1.9.25 and 1.10.0) of those primitives are continued in the JOML-CI/joml-primitives repository. For this 1.10.0 release, see: https://github.com/JOML-CI/joml-primitives/releases/tag/1.10.0*

**Additions**
- Vector2i.div() - Thanks to @EXTER7 (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/253) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/dc961709010592f1b6c95258be68d707bc45feb3)
- Quaternion.equals(delta) - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/263) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/9867ebffefbc4cd31b3bbbc62c7b9dabbc4de112)
- Math.lerp/biLerp/triLerp() - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/275) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/631362a660073e38e21b113aeb3c53cb36575329)
- Math.signum() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/267) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/15bb744f75361d63671351402de2735dc3b748cd)
- Vector2i(float/double,float/double,RoundingMode) constructor - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/276) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/a26ae0347a4b303cb38d47c8b0e6093ff80c7a10)
- Matrix3.quadraticFormProduct() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/251) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/5a73b16e6e3c938af256489994721f79b1ff5473)

**Fixes**
- GeometryUtils.bitangent() - Thanks to @Kerai (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/243) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3a4dd2d421719ba1e0216fbfa49796b0d212e601)
- Creating AxisAngle from identity quaternion - Thanks to @lukehutch (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/255) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1627a3241bb079098c8395bb1634661b339cfb21, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/57fb50c82d23e0b9c2a1235baea37d66a1ef28c3)
- Parameter aliasing in Matrix4.mulPerspectiveAffine() - Thanks to @Exolothon (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/266) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3275f4f2d15979bdfc1bb7ee17fce304356281ff)
- Sign in GeometryUtils.perpendicular() - Thanks to @tpietzsch (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/272) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1f5082440bf3805ab25ce24720fb54bc7d18c644)
- Use sync instead of CAS-seeding with sun.misc.Unsafe in Random - Thanks to @Danjb1 (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/273) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/407eabd0836cc1e5332d994be10042f052570c9e)
- Parameter aliasing in Matrix3x2.scaleAround() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/424d180686cbca8253546099c4a788fec4c5afc8)

**Miscellaneous**
- Fix FrustumIntersection JavaDocs - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d1361d1aa159273547de89ee0e67e72b8ee95ae4)
- Fix documentation of Vector\[34\]\[fd\].mulAdd() - Thanks to @Runemoro (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/254) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d7c73af201ab4f5c3789c7f52d25f6b6988223b5)
- Add missing JavaDocs - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/772b770e7b6f0b26e30ad76bd5d41e241fb9f3b8)

**Breaking Changes**
- Unify AABB/Rectangle intersection test method names - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/239) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/240) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/582daa199f8c1230168ddedd82f392d921ae3b5d)
  - rename AABB.test\*() to intersects\*()
  - rename Rectangle.intersects() to intersectsRectangle()
  - rename Rectangle.contains() to containsPoint()

**Additions**
- Matrix4.transformTranspose(), Vector4.mulTranspose() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/094f9fd49afec20eb3d46b03e16a411c9be2fe4e, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/8e8a5d36009da422119de849cd9d4264f19ea95c)
- Matrix4f.setTransposed(array|buffer) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/ff6deb5644ec49781264948b879f3f497dc6776e)
- Matrix4f.setTransposedFromAddress() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/2a523b675885f76f012d561e64a5ba114e606699)
- Math.clamp(float|double|int) - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/233) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/14033e6c388489b045053099a9fd9231a2bb9200)
- AABBi - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/235) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4e35f9b79ab77a4d868b5bdb07fd7bf46b744854)
- AABB.set(AABBi/d/f source) - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/234) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/238) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/579f1dea2a5aa943f82eb0d8f109d1ea63ef3dbf)
- AABB.isValid(), .validate(), .intersection() - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/239) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/240) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/582daa199f8c1230168ddedd82f392d921ae3b5d)
- Expose generic Matrix4.mul() as mul0() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/279d1532e5ae95406fce22542b2fdd52f729b862)

**Fixes**
- AxisAngle4.set(Matrix) when identity matrix - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/9fba2f49a04647f20c9c05cbfff9083bc719076c)
- Rectangle.contains(point) - Thanks to @BenjaminAmos (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/227) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1cdb432cfa04a21093f59d717f9f0bc25b79074a)
- Vector2f/d.perpendicular() - Thanks to @ieperen3039 (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/230) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/2c119bd6b32a9f4269e9d3ba3c874a59b59a0290)
- Rectanglei.writeExternal() writing float instead of int - Thanks to @pollend (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/236) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/e18d378189710286b808781a6e5b127ac4a0de9c)
- Parameter ordering in Quaternion.rotateYXZ() - Thanks to @kBlaszczyk (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/237) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/6cf938b3635179c377639ddadc54943b0cfce42a)
- Intersection.findClosestPointOnRectangle() - Thanks to @defance (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/242) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/fae6cfa1b9c9b1172600cfdb1214f4e6807bbe1b)

**Miscellaneous**
- Make Matrix4f.rotateXYZ() take a Vector3fc - Thanks to @cry0genic (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/226) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b2d980c3859610947f69ef1cac700afbff838304)
- Improve performance of Matrix4.set/get(column, row) using Unsafe - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3e016d30d6421051623ce3998e1e3e966dedcf0d)
- Add -Djoml.forceUnsafe option to force the use of Unsafe in MemUtil - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/53c02459515ffe6aa17c984388cc39c6484e9d3c)
- Improve performance of Matrix3.set/get(column, row) using Unsafe - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/d024b83d168137f40f119dd4a0d17ae7ae496807)
- Do not include sources and gwt xml in Graal build - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/7fdd55a40ff7c03d8335ad4a97ce233f7d9c2818)
- Fix JavaDocs of methods returning `this` - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/be76b05929caf39d05be6b500decb018100d7f7c)

**Additions**
- Rectangle methods - Thanks to @pollend (#221, #222) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/93ecf59d65bb5d1af44d4b60cf4ca67dac3ae658, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/2b3534a3da5110bbdf157b4110e4d789d520b516, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c710e0c5a10da014f003aee80d17aac1abda3d90, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/86ddf08f4036da3d1aefc93b42b9a8f227fac2fa)
- no-args Random constructor - Thanks to @XenoAmess (#224) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b79a6cc17287138e36d527fbe58535daed06be23, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1c1a276489625a1ea0ee06833e4c147500e19e59)
- Vector2f/d.div() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/fc9a8a1f75546c8c9740c4072275060f90d69b19)

**Fixes**
- switch from microbenchmark-based detection of FMA to toggle - Thanks to @theagentd (#225) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/0257c39fa0d62ab0e6b0608d31851ef6f19d0ba8)
- Intersection.POINT_ON_TRIANGLE_FACE value - Thanks to @Xayton (#223) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c8c4ce7bc5e1dc74fe3cf8eb33a8017db1e5d6c6)

**Additions**
- Quaternion/Matrix.isFinite() - (#211) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/537c93d847e45e16dcc1be5468e600b7e03b42fd)
- Math.safeAsin() to handle floating-point inaccuracies - (#217) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/9aecd42ab0b7d9c0983c90e14cf4e9c440f6d1c8)
- Rectangle.scale() - Thanks to @MKMax (#216) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/761588408ad2c87e7dff03bef99578e63a8f5e8d)

**Fixes**
- Quaternion.rotationTo/rotateTo to handle non-unit vectors - Thanks to @ieperen3039 (#212) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/27d49aab126042da6ee800bf8e3782b0a910ae1c)

Changes compared to 1.9.0:

**Breaking Changes**
- remove `-Djoml.noproxy` - proxy instantiation in `toImmutable()` is now explicitly _enabled_ via `-Djoml.debug` (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/e1032ac90864e3614529e639098ece61bd77357b)
- rename Vector3.set() to setComponent() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/99)
- Quaternion.scale() - now applies uniform scaling instead of spherical interpolation, so has the same geometric interpretation as (and is symmetric to) Matrix.scale() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/14e89a58e53d36dbce99e7e5269b2d9640a7e4a2)

**Additions**
- Vector2/4.setComponent() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/99) thanks to @mfg92
- Quaternion can now represent rotations and uniform scaling - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/14e89a58e53d36dbce99e7e5269b2d9640a7e4a2, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c74116cbef5598f7c6ec0dcfe2e49f947fd52b4d)
- Matrix4x3.translationRotateMul() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/7987a285e2d99363c19e811e1a3ad5adb2122103)

**Fixes**
- Matrix4x3.setTranslation() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/082e09a3e400acfca7dba33f1500477137e9c928) thanks to @theagentd for reporting

**Improvements**
- ensure maximum performance under JDK9 - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b551edeb26ca4bd5cadb4981a72d4f4e48dfbbdb)
- performance of Matrix4.rotateXYZ/YXZ/ZYX - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/de40f9af2454b4081480cc1af24a1ecc14833d91)
- building on JDK9 to produce 1.4 class files - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/72a2b0d32635078ce8de46e78c9d2f10e8875a59, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/dfc6444008da0189bb6179807dd080e68d3832be)

Changes compared to 1.8.6:

**Breaking Changes**
- Intersection.testCircleCircle() now also returns true if one circle contains the other one
- Removed TrapezoidOrthoCrop due to implementing a patented algorithm

**Fixes**
- Quaterniond.fromAxisAngleDeg() was taking radians and not degrees - thanks to @bcdaughe (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/pull/98)
- Maven plugin upgrades to build JOML under JDK9 - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/ac5fcea1e6fc44640f254d1d8921eed9d48554ff)
- various JavaDocs

**Additions**
- New 'immutable views' on all JOML classes (vectors, matrices, quaternions) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/52)
- New **sampling** package for generating:
  - "Best Candidate" sample patterns on quad, disk and sphere
  - "Poisson" sample patterns on disk
  - "Spiral" sample patterns with equi-angular distribution on disk
  - "Stratified" sample patterns on an N times N strata grid
  - "Uniform"/random sample patterns on disk and sphere
  - Convolution class to generate (separable) Gaussian kernels
- new system property `-Djoml.debug` - performs checks that _direct_ NIO Buffers are used when `-Djoml.nounsafe` is not set and `sun.misc.Unsafe` is available
- missing Quaternionf.fromAxisAngle*() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/7ebd0fe99488a4fe4e1b1a8f644201c9e0b92c0a)
- Matrix.getEulerAnglesZYX() - the reverse of Matrix.rotateZYX() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/5901ae4dee338df8b036901c7ef99d0483293de3)
- Vector3.mulPosition/Direction(Matrix4x3) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/fc727458dc6fdaa1b9fbbc5027f96820883ae5ed)
- Matrix4x3d.get4x4(Buffer) - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/65a08cd87d13800814b8f0260180add498f7066b)
- various overloads for Matrix methods taking other compatible classes as parameters - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1d3a2f2ced6d042c1bf510db1e23a90997fc73d9)
- Matrix.setColumn/setRow() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c8cd17db5d16e1447d012b3e4dc8a6ff611a56f4)

**Improvements**
- system property `-Djoml.fastmath` now uses even faster _and more accurate_ sin/cos approximation - thanks to @roquendm (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/cb0cb05b798f9209701b40d4083963eed3c85afa)
- performance improvements for copying between Vector and NIO Buffer - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3cbc1668886e5d8ba2bee9740abd27c3d93cbb35)
- optimize Matrix4f copy constructors - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/536143f81167005cb0e56a0e5784933ec4994b07)
- optimize Vector2i/Vector3i.get/put() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/cb1fe8aea63523a39e2aee0eaf027c045d55d90c)
- optimize Matrix3f.scaling() and Matrix4/4x3f.translate() - (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/f5d2f320008336c0a6f94c2a95a1f2a276a13357)

Changes compared to 1.8.0:

**Breaking changes:**
- Matrix4.transpose3x3() now only modifies the upper-left submatrix (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1968e403f70f8b9b402a140eacd9f9e664b926a9) - use-case: Matrix4.get3x3(Matrix3), transpose(), Matrix4.set3x3(Matrix3) for building billboard model transformations
- renamed Matrix4.rotateAffineLocal() to .rotateLocal() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4875481b2c9c84e765789c4380614997289dd4d9)
- disallow direct access to the fields in Matrix4. The existing mNN() accessor methods must be used now

**Fixes:**
- Matrix4.set(AxisAngle) and .getColumn() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1da97326dc942beabab72915cedb218af8721b9b)
- ambiguous rotation in Quaternion.rotateTo()/rotationTo() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/0d9848cc451466a403af0008f5b4f96f5aae0f28, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/be673251275c4d4bad94848bbb1d2ea7172f0a95) - thanks to @sanjay900 for reporting ( https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/issues/82)
- various JavaDoc fixes

**Additions:**
- Matrix4x3f/Matrix4x3d class for affine-only transformations
- Matrix.transform*() overloads taking primitive floats as the input vector (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/64a94d6ef575f708658aa2e1d1475034835964cd)
- Quaternion.transform() overloads taking primitive floats as input vector (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b8f4f41566a592b341bf9e471766da1ad4ade722)
- Matrix4d.getTransposed() and .get4x3Transposed() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/af218aca44edd49a2bf14e39700e62dd25f38868, https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/14c41bec4ec428dc7e4bdbe4951b122367e5dab4)
- QuaternionInterpolator classes (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/28985a3a40cc52c09a2318bfd24cca66b298e03a) - interpolation over a series of quaternions using SVD for skeletal animation
- Quaternion.add() with primitive parameters (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/3c6f58c3c12dfa14c6f8a6c71bab8e407163e123)
- Vector3.rotationTo() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/60d791241bfca6c8cd0ab7217d1e32f5552ddc6a) - convenience for Quaternion.rotationTo() similar to OGRE3D's Vector3.getRotationTo()
- Matrix4.lookAtPerspective()/lookAtPerspectiveLH() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4953e3bd11a38c0f5c82da719e9785e5fb153078) - special-case method for applying look-at transformation to a perspective projection
- Matrix4.set4x3(Matrix4) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/fb22d0fbb1747f2d6581f8c369f1b8f1fadef028)
- Matrix4.translationRotateScaleInvert() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/c8a8de72e338a59dc8cc13f2cc7a86e7c8911cc7) - 2x performance improvement over special-case translationRotateScale().invertAffine()
- Gradle build.gradle (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1d77dad0d8cbc5e7fd65a8fdd4cddf17b017e504)

**Improvements:**
- performance improvement for most Matrix4 methods by tracking common properties of a matrix and routing to specialized methods (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/4953e3bd11a38c0f5c82da719e9785e5fb153078)
- performance improvements for Matrix3.mul()/invert() (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/82ed59cd4fd21f90beed2acc2df3ff7258abd1a8)
- performance optimization for Matrix4.set(Matrix4) (https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/b2dd8141d7ebfd5e90e2e75354a50ef38b1d77ff) - thanks to @theagentd for reporting

Changes compared to 1.7.1:

**Breaking changes:**
- renamed Matrix.*4x3() methods to Matrix.*Affine()
- removed Matrix4.unproject() overload taking explicit 'view' and 'projection' matrices
- changed Matrix4.origin() to not require 'this' to be affine
- changed Matrix4.set3x3() to only modify the upper left 3x3 submatrix, unlike Matrix4.set(Matrix3f)

**Improvements:**
- Performance improvement for all Matrix3/4.invert*() and .mul*() and other methods (See https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/0e29266618fc68ca0af9a61131dddd5e7fdaeffd and https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/commit/1d46507e4a34ff721347a2458273d9e0707b4bdf)
- Performance improvement for transferring a matrix from/to a NIO buffer via new MemUtil class

**Additions:**
- FrustumIntersection now implements a version of the "temporal coherency" frustum culling algorithm layed out in section 2.5 of [Efficient View Frustum Culling](http://www.cescg.org/CESCG-2002/DSykoraJJelinek/) in addition to "plane masking"
- added Matrix4.perspectiveLH(), .frustumLH(), .orthoLH(), .lookAtLH() - for left-handed coordinate systems, for example for people coming from Direct3D
- added Intersection.intersectLineSegmentPlane() and .intersectLineLine()
- added TrapezoidOrthoCrop - for implementing Trapezoidal Shadow Maps
- added Matrix4.orthoCrop() and .trapezoidCrop() - to support Trapezoidal Shadow Maps
- added Matrix4.projectedGridRange() - to support "Projected Grid" rendering
- added Matrix4.perspectiveFrustumSlice() - to support Cascaded Shadow Maps
- added Matrix4.frustumAabb() - to support Cascaded Shadow Maps
- added Matrix4.arcball() overload with 'dest' matrix parameter
- added Matrix4.invertAffineUnitScale()/invertLookAt() - for faster special-case matrix inversion
- added Matrix4.invertFrustum(), .invertOtho() and .invertPerspective() - for faster special-case matrix inversion
- added Matrix4.invertPerspectiveView() - for faster special-case matrix inversion
- added Matrix4.mulOrthoAffine() and .mulPerspectiveAffine() - for faster special-case matrix multiplication
- added Matrix4.translationRotateScaleMulAffine() - for faster special-case matrix composition/multiplication
- added Vulkan compatibility to all applicable Matrix4 methods, such as ortho() and perspective()
- added Matrix4.perspectiveFar(), .perspectiveNear()
- added Matrix4.transformAab() - to support fast AABB/frustum culling
- added Matrix4.originAffine() - was previously .origin()
- added MemUtil - for faster copying between Matrix and NIO Buffers using sun.misc.Unsafe when available
- added Vector.mul(), .add() with object and primitive overloads, where missing
- added Matrix4.translateLocal(), .rotateLocal(), .scaleLocal() - for pre-multiplication
- added Matrix3.rotateLocal(), .scaleLocal() - for pre-multiplication
- added Matrix4.rotateAffine()
- added Matrix4.unprojectRay(), .unprojectInvRay() - for ray picking
- added getter methods for matrix elements for future Matrix subclasses not using primitive fields

Changes to the 1.6.6 release:
- rename Matrix4.transformPoint() -> .transformPosition()
- fix Vector3.maxComponent()
- fix Matrix3.determinant()
- fix various JavaDocs
- add hashCode()/equals() to all matrix classes
- add Matrix4.billboardCylindrical() and .billboardSpherical()
- add Matrix3.positiveX/Y/Z()
- add Matrix.swap()
- add Matrix4.transformAffine(Vector4)
- add Matrix4.origin(Vector3)
- add Matrix4.pick()
- add Matrix4.isAffine()
- add MatrixStack.rotateXYZ/YXZ/ZYX()
- add Vector3.minComponent()

name: 1.3.5-SNAPSHOT release
body:
**GitHub Releases are being discontinued as of 1.3.5-SNAPSHOT in favor of Maven deployed versions available at [oss.sonatype.org](https://oss.sonatype.org/content/repositories/snapshots/org/joml/) and [Maven Central](https://repo.maven.apache.org/maven2/org/joml/joml/).**
**See [the Wiki](https://github.com/JOML-CI/JOML/wiki) for more information.**

Changes to the 1.3.4-SNAPSHOT release:
- changed all angle parameters/fields from degrees to radians
- fixed Matrix4.isAabInFrustum() - use new algorithm which actually works
- removed GeometryUtils.calculateFrustumPlanes() - frustum planes can be obtained via Matrix4
- renamed Vector3/4.mul(Quaternion) to rotate()
- added Matrix4.positive[XYZ]() methods - used to compute the direction of the respective axes before applying the transformation matrix
- addded some Vector3/4 methods taking primitive parameters
- added Matrix4.frustumCorner() - compute the eight frustum corners
- added Matrix4.perspectiveOrigin() - origin/center of perspective projection
- added Matrix4.perspectiveFov() - vertical field-of-view angle
- added Matrix4d.get(double[], int)
- improved performance of the Matrix4.is*InsideFrustum() methods

name: 1.3.4-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.3.3-SNAPSHOT release:
- added GeometryUtils with calculateFrustumPlanes()
- merged SurfaceMath into GeometryUtils
- added Matrix4.frustumPlane() - computes one of the six possible frustum planes
- added Matrix4.isPointInsideFrustum()
- added Matrix4.isSphereInsideFrustum()
- added Matrix4.isAabInsideFrustum()
- added Matrix4.frustumRayDir() - computes directions from the original through the near/far frustum planes; usable for software raycasting/raytracing
- added Matrix4.directionOfZ() - compute what +Z was before transforming with 'this'
- added Vector4.normalize3() - normalizes all components only using the norm of (x, y, z)
- refactorings
- JavaDocs

name: 1.3.3-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.3.2-SNAPSHOT release:
- JOML is now being deployed to Sonatype.org starting with this 1.3.3-SNAPSHOT release!
- added Matrix4.determinant3x3() and .transpose3x3()
- added Matrix4.ortho2D() and .setOrtho2D() - works like the GLU function
- added Matrix4.orthoSymmetric() and .setOrthoSymmetric() - takes just width and height
- added Matrix4.unprojectInv() with Vector3 'winCoords' parameter
- added Vector2d(Vector2f) constructor

name: 1.3.2-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.3.1-SNAPSHOT release:
- updated JavaDocs to pass JDK 1.8 doclint
- removed static Vector4d.mul method

name: 1.3.1-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.3.0 release:
- added all methods of Quaternionf to Quaterniond
- made angles in AxisAngle4f to auto-normalize
- made angle() methods in vector classes return degrees consistently
- added div() to vector classes
- added more conversion methods between all classes
- added Matrix3/4.scaling(float) - scales all axes uniformly
- added Matrix3/4.scale with 'dest' parameter
- added Matrix4.translate with 'dest' parameter
- fixed Matrix4.normal - compute only the 3x3 submatrix determinant
- made MatrixStack not implement Externalizable - would have needed a public no-args constructor then
- refactored all static methods in vectors to instance methods with 'dest' parameter
- JavaDocs

name: 1.3.0 release
body:
Changes to the 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT release:
- fixed (set)LookAt/lookAlong in Matrix3 and Matrix4 classes (#26)
- fixed (set)LookRotate in Quaternion classes (#26)
- fixed Vector4f.mul(Vector4f)
- added methods from Matrix3f to Matrix3d
- renamed Matrix4.fromMatrix3 to .setMatrix3 - this goes in line with all other methods setting 'this' to the values of some other convertible object
- replaced Quaterniond.lookAt with lookRotate - the latter takes a direction instead of two points and behaves just like its Quaternionf cousin
- replaced most static methods with methods taking a 'dest' parameter
- JavaDocs

name: 1.3.0-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.9-SNAPSHOT release:
- added all functionality of Matrix4f to Matrix4d (#20)
- added Matrix.normal - computes a normal matrix of a given 3x3 matrix or submatrix (#23)
- added Matrix4.project with Vector3 parameter (#21)
- added Matrix4.mul4x3 - multiplies only by the top-left 4x3 (4 columns, 3 rows) submatrix of the right matrix (#22)
- added Vector.fma - fused multiply-add
- fixed Matrix4f.translation
- renamed AngleAxis4f to AxisAngle4f (#25)
- renamed Quaternion to Quaternionf (#24)
- renamed QuaternionD to Quaterniond (#24)
- refactored a few static methods to instance methods with 'dest' parameter
- formatting
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.9-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.8-SNAPSHOT release:
- added new Interpolate class for simple interpolation methods
- removed the interop methods (see #18)
- renamed Quaternion.setEulerAnglesRad\* to rotate\* (those methods now also change from _setting_ a rotation to _applying_ that rotation)
- added Quaternion.getEulerAnglesXYZ (retrieve the euler angles for a XYZ rotation sequence)
- fixed Quaternion.slerp
- added Quaternion.rotationTo (this is the 'set' method for rotateTo)
- added smoothStep and hermite interpolation to vector classes
- only disable doclint when building under JDK 1.8
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.8-SNAPSHOT
body:
Changes to the 1.2.7-SNAPSHOT release:
- added AngleAxis4f.transform(Vector4f)
- added Matrix4f.reflect() with Quaternion taking a 'dest' parameter
- fixed bug in Quaternion.rotateTo()
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.7-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.6-SNAPSHOT release:
- added AngleAxis4f.get(Matrix3f)
- added Matrix3f.rotate[XYZ] with dest parameter
- added missing Matrix4f.reflection() overloads
- added selected Matrix4f.reflect() methods to MatrixStack
- removed static methods from MatrixStack
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.6-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.5-SNAPSHOT release:
- added AngleAxis4f.get(Matrix3f)
- added Matrix3f.rotate[XYZ] overloads with dest parameter
- added lookAlong/setLookAlong to Matrix3f
- added Matrix4f.unproject and .project with vector parameters
- added Matrix4f.reflect/reflection - computes a reflection transformation that reflects about a given arbitrary plane either specified via a general plane equation or via normal and point
- added Vector3x.normalize with dest parameter

name: 1.2.5-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.4-SNAPSHOT release:
- added more conversion methods between matrix, quaternion and angle-axis classes
- support for more matrix and quaternion methods taking a 'dest' parameter
- renamed Quaternion.rotateDirToPositiveZ to lookRotate() - this is how Unity names this method and it behaves in the same way
- added Quaternion.rotateTo - rotates a given direction to point along another direction using a shortest arc rotation (this is somewhat the generalization of lookRotate, but without an 'up' vector)

name: 1.2.4-SNAPSHOT release
body:
- added conversion methods between AngleAxis4f, Quaternion, Matrix3f and Matrix4f
- added transform(vector) method for AngleAxis4f
- changed Matrix3d to use degrees consistently for all rotate methods
- added rotation[XYZ] methods to Matrix3f
- added rotate() methods from Matrix4f to Matrix3f
- added Quaternion.rotateDirToPositiveZ() - this will apply a rotation that maps the given 'dir' to the positive z-axis, and thus acts almost like GLU lookAt and the Matrix4.lookAlong() methods, except that those map to the negative z-axis to comply with OpenGL's coordinate system handedness conventions
- renamed QuaternionD.LookAt to .lookAt
- changed Quaternion.div to post-multiply by the inverse of the right-side quaternion - this is also how XNA is doing quaternion math and it is consistent with mul() and all methods in Quaternion and Matrix classes that apply transformations using post-multiplication, which in turn is what OpenGL/GLU does
- also made JOML pass Findbugs static code analysis with default settings
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.3-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.2-SNAPSHOT release:
- fixed Quaternion.invert
- added equals/hashCode to AngleAxis4f and quaternion classes
- added Quaternion.transform(Vector4f) - to transform the vector by the quaternion
- added Vector.mul(Quaternion) - also to transform the vector by the quaternion
- added Quaternion.get(AngleAxis4f) - to convert the quaternion into the corresponding angle-axis representation
- added Quaternion.difference - (computes the difference between two quaternions - geometrically this is the rotation that needs to be applied to the first quaternion in order to get the second quaternion)

name: 1.2.2-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.1-SNAPSHOT release:
- added Matrix4f.rotate with a 'dest' parameter
- renamed Quaternion.set(angleaxis) to rotationAxis
- added Quaternion.rotation() which sets a rotation using the given degrees around the base unit axes of the coordinate system (to reflect the Matrix4f class)
- added Quaternion.rotate() which applies (post-multiplies) a rotation to the quaternion using the given degrees around the base unit axes of the coordinate system (to reflect the Matrix4f class)
- added shortcut rotate[XYZ] and rotation[XYZ] methods to Quaternion

name: 1.2.1-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes to the 1.2.0 release:
- added Quaternion.set(matrix) allowing to set the quaternion to the rotational part of a matrix
- added Quaternion.transform(vector) to apply the quaternion rotation to a vector
- added Quaternion.nlerp(), which is a non-spherical linear interpolation with non-linear (angular) velocity
- added Quaternion.integrate(), which allows to apply angular velocity to an existing quaternion to build a new rotation
- added Vector2f.lengthSquared() and Vector2f.mul()
- added Vector3.dot(), .reflect() and .half()
- refactored Quaternion.set*()/.get*() methods to just name .set()/.get()
- JavaDocs

name: 1.2.0 release
body:
Changes compared to the 1.1.7-SNAPSHOT release:
- fixes for quaternion mul (thanks to @FortressBuilder)
- new test suite (thanks to @FortressBuilder)
- added angle(), angleCos() and static negate() to vector classes (thanks to @FortressBuilder)
- improved toString methods (thanks to @FortressBuilder)
- added getRow() and getColumn() methods to matrix classes (thanks to @zmrodriguez91)
- JavaDocs

name: 1.1.7-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Changes compared to the 1.1.6-SNAPSHOT release:
- Fixed Quaternion.conjugate (thanks to FortressBuilder)
- Removed some hardly useful methods
- Make matrix classes more in sync with Matrix4f
- Changed MatrixStack.get to return the MatrixStack instead of the FloatBuffer
- Added toString(NumberFormat) to the matrix classes
- Fixed a few JavaDocs

name: 1.1.6-SNAPSHOT release
body:
Difference to the 1.1.5 release:
- Removed the class name from toString() output
- JavaDocs
- Added project() and unproject() to Matrix4f (known from GLU)
- Fixed bug in Vector3f.sub (thanks to FortressBuilder from the LWJGL forum)
- Added hashCode and equals methods to the vector classes (thanks to zmrodriguez91 for contribution)

name: 1.1.5 release
body:
Changes to the 1.1.5-SNAPSHOT release:
- methods operating on FloatBuffer do not change the buffer position
- Added even more JavaDoc

name: 1.1.5-SNAPSHOT release
body:
- change package and groupId to org.joml
- add convenience Matrix4f.transform(Vector3f) with w=1.0

name: 1.1.4-SNAPSHOT release
body:
- added MatrixStack.lookAt with float parameters
- updated license headers
- added more JavaDoc

name: 1.1.3-SNAPSHOT release
body:
- fixed a few JavaDocs
- added setLookAlong methods to Matrix4f

name: 1.1.2-SNAPSHOT release
body:
- Change Matrix4f.get(FloatBuffer) to _not_ advance the buffer position
- add Matrix4f.get(int, FloatBuffer) to take an absolute buffer position

name: Sixth snapshot release
body:
- renamed AxisAngle4f to AngleAxis4f to reflect that the angle comes first in common APIs, such as Unity and OpenGL
- made the angle in AngleAxis4f methods to mean "degrees" (this also reflects most other APIs)
- added Matrix.get(Matrix) methods to store intermediate computation results
- made Quaternion fluent
- added non-multiplied setOrtho, setFrustum, setPerspective and setLookAt in Matrix4f

name: Fifth snapshot release
body:
- added AxisAngle4f class
- JavaDoc and refactorings
- little additional methods
- interop with libGDX Matrix4
- stay allocation-free (allocate all stack matrices in MatrixStack constructor)

name: Fourth snapshot release
body:
- removed all *fast methods from matrix and vector classes
- made more methods fluent
- added matrix.mul(quaternion)
- fixed quaternion.getMatrix()
- added vector.negate()
- refactoring

name: Third snapshot release
body:
- Matrix4f.mul now decides whether or not to take the fast path previously implemented in mulFast
- Renamed the arbitrary frustum perspective method to "frustum" (the same as the OpenGL function)
- Add frustum to MatrixStack
- Refactorings and JavaDoc

name: Second snapshot release
body:
- Removed some unnecessary methods
- Added perspective() method in Matrix4f to create arbitrary (non-symmetric) frustum transformations. This can be useful for Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality applications using head-tracking, like in this demo https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jd3-eiid-Uw

name: First snapshot release
body: This is a first snapshot release of JOML version 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT.
